nodes.text: The Juno II was a Republic Sienar Systems Marauder-class corvette in the Kathol Republic Navy.

In 8 ABY, the Juno II responded to a distress call from the Bravado III, alongside her sister ships Mirandine, Quillion, Siroma, Solidarity, and Triumph. Together, they intercepted the modified New Republic corvette FarStar and impounded it on Dayark.
